entity.name: Remote JavaScript Debugging
entity.description: Deprecated since React Native 0.73. Remote JavaScript Debugging connects an external web browser (Chrome) to your app and runs your JavaScript code inside a web page.
entity.descriptionClean: Deprecated since React Native 0.73. Remote JavaScript Debugging connects an external web browser (Chrome) to your app and runs your JavaScript code inside a web page.

entity.name: Hermes Debugger
entity.description: Available starting with React Native 0.73. Debug JavaScript code on the device via Hermes that supports Chrome DevTools Protocol.
entity.descriptionClean: Available starting with React Native 0.73. Debug JavaScript code on the device via Hermes that supports Chrome DevTools Protocol.

entity.name: Direct JSC debugging
entity.description: Use Safari to debug the iOS version of your app when using JavaScriptCore (JSC) as your app's runtime.
entity.descriptionClean: Use Safari to debug the iOS version of your app when using JavaScriptCore (JSC) as your app's runtime.
entity.descriptionHtml: Use Safari to debug the iOS version of your app when using JavaScriptCore (JSC) as your app's runtime.

entity.name: React Native DevTools
entity.description: Starting with React Native 0.76. New default debugging experience for React Native apps based on Chrome DevTools Protocol with React DevTools included.
entity.descriptionClean: Starting with React Native 0.76. New default debugging experience for React Native apps based on Chrome DevTools Protocol with React DevTools included.

entity.name: Experimental New Debugger
entity.description: Available in React Native 0.73 - 0.75. The preview of the experimental new debugger experience with a new debugger frontend.
entity.descriptionClean: Available in React Native 0.73 - 0.75. The preview of the experimental new debugger experience with a new debugger frontend.

entity.name: React DevTools
entity.description: Components inspector and performance profiler that let's you debug the React component hierarchy within your app.
entity.descriptionClean: Components inspector and performance profiler that let's you debug the React component hierarchy within your app.
entity.descriptionHtml: Components inspector and performance profiler that let's you debug the React component hierarchy within your app.

entity.name: Element Inspector
entity.description: The inspector lets you tap on any UI element in the app and see information about it.
entity.descriptionClean: The inspector lets you tap on any UI element in the app and see information about it.

entity.name: LogBox
entity.description: Displays console errors and console warnings as the overlay inside your app.
entity.descriptionClean: Displays console errors and console warnings as the overlay inside your app.

entity.name: Performance Monitor
entity.description: Displays performance overlay inside your app. Inspect RAM consumption, UI and JS threads FPS and number of views mounted.
entity.descriptionClean: Displays performance overlay inside your app. Inspect RAM consumption, UI and JS threads FPS and number of views mounted.

entity.name: Flipper
entity.description: Cross-platform debugging tool for mobile apps. Visualize, inspect, and control your apps from a desktop interface, with extensibility via plugins.
entity.descriptionClean: Cross-platform debugging tool for mobile apps. Visualize, inspect, and control your apps from a desktop interface, with extensibility via plugins.

entity.name: Reactotron
entity.description: A desktop app for inspecting your React JS and React Native projects. macOS, Linux, and Windows.
entity.descriptionClean: A desktop app for inspecting your React JS and React Native projects. macOS, Linux, and Windows.

entity.name: Expo Dev tools plugins
entity.description: Available for Expo Development builds of your app. Add debugging features on top of installed libraries.
entity.descriptionClean: Available for Expo Development builds of your app. Add debugging features on top of installed libraries.

entity.name: react-native-performance
entity.description: Toolchain to measure and monitor the performance of your React Native app in development, pipeline and in production.
entity.descriptionClean: Toolchain to measure and monitor the performance of your React Native app in development, pipeline and in production.

entity.name: Flashlight
entity.description: Lighthouse for Mobile - audits your app and gives a performance score to your Android apps.
entity.descriptionClean: Lighthouse for Mobile - audits your app and gives a performance score to your Android apps.

entity.name: react-native-flipper-performance-monitor
entity.description: An attempt to have a lighthouse for React Native. Flipper plugin to show a graph of the React Native performance monitor.
entity.descriptionClean: An attempt to have a lighthouse for React Native. Flipper plugin to show a graph of the React Native performance monitor.
